stories.text:
My mother died unexpectedly several months ago and it's been a total nightmare to understand her finances, mostly because I can't get into her Gmail account.

I attempted to contact Google at https://support.google.com/accounts/troubleshooter/6357590?hl=en, where I uploaded her death certificate and my driver's license, and they just told me they won't give me access.

They informed me that "to protect the privacy of people who use Google services, we are unable to share further details about the account or discuss our determination in greater detail."

Has anyone been able to gain access to their parent's Gmail account? As her only heir, I am totally up against an AI wall.
stories.title: Ask HN: How to get access to an unexpectedly deceased parent's Gmail account?
